13477.「次に連絡するときは メギドロームを\n 倒した後と 決めていたのですが……\n:
I had decided that the next time I would contact you would be after I had defeated Megidrome...but apparently that is no longer
the case.

13478.「じつは オーグリード大陸のランガーオ山地の\n 東の果てで 奴のアジトを 発見:
As a matter of fact, we discovered his hideout in the far eastern reaches of the Langao Mountains in Ogreed Continent. It's called
Snowfield Ruins!

13479.「……で そこまでは よかったんですが\n メギドロームは つねに 手下を連れて:
But Megidrome always has his men with him. I
don't think I can win by myself.

13480.「ご迷惑ばかりかけて 申し訳ないのですが\n どうか ここまで来て\n 私に 協:
I'm sorry to cause you all this trouble, but
could you please come down here and help me?

13481.「おお ありがとうございます！\n あなたには 何度 助けられたことか……\n:
Oh, thank you! I can't tell you how many times
you've helped me and I can't thank you enough.

13482.「メギドロームのアジトは オーグリード大陸\n ランガーオ山地の東部にある 雪原:
Megidrome's hideout is in the eastern part of Langao Mountains, Ogreed Continent, in the Snowfield Ruins. Please come as quickly as
possible.

13483.「その時こそ あなたの前に\n 私の姿を 見せることになるでしょう。:
Only then will you be able to see me before
you.

13484.「よかった！……と言いたいところですが\n あなたは 今 たくさんの頼まれごとを:
Good for you! ...but it seems you have a lot
of favors to do right now.

13485.「メギドロームのアジトに 突入するのは\n しばらく 待ちますから\n 先に 頼:
We'll wait a while before we break into the
Megidrome's hideout, so go ahead and finish
what you've been asked to do.

13486.「……そうですか。\n 残念ですが しかたないですね。:
...I see. I'm sorry to hear that, but it can't
be helped.

13487.「それでも もし……もし 少しでも\n 私を 助けてくれてもいいと思ったなら\n:
Still, if... if you think you can help me in
any way, please talk to this mirror again.

13489.「もしかして メギドロームを倒すのを\n 手伝ってほしいという 私の頼み\n 引:
Perhaps you would be willing to do me the
favor of helping me defeat the Megidrome?

13491.「だが 大いなるチカラを手に入れた\n 我の敵では なかったな。\n この程度で:
But I am no match for the great power I have
received. This is nothing more than a shoulder
to lean on.

13492.「貴様……さては リュナンの仲間だな？: You... you are Lunan's companion, aren't you?

13493.「ちょうどいい。貴様には\n 我が 大いなるチカラを試すための\n 試金石となっ:
Just as well. You will be the touchstone to
test my great power.

13494.「ほう。こりずに また来たのか。: Oh. You've come back again, haven't you?

13495.「うれしいぞ。この大いなるチカラを\n まだ 試させてくれるというのだな。\n:
I am happy. You still want to let me test this
great power, don't you? All right, come on!

13498.「あぶないところでした。\n メギドロームの手下が <cs_pchero>さんを:
It was a close call. Megidrome's men were
after <cs_pchero> from behind.

13500.「……そうです。私が 魔法使いリュナンです。: ...Yes, that's right. I am the mage Lunan.

13501.「おどろくのも 無理はありません。\n 自分が 今まで 話していた相手の正体が\:
It's no wonder I'm so frightened. I had no
idea that the person I had been talking to was
a monster...

13502.「それにしても さすがは <cs_pchero>さん。\n あのメギドロームを:
But still, as expected of <cs_pchero>. I was
impressed that they were able to defeat the
Megidrome.

13503.「何か お礼をしたいのですが\n ミラクルゾーン以上のものとなると\n もはや:
I would like to thank you in some way, but
when it comes to anything more than the 0
Zone, I no longer have any...

13504.「そうだ！ 私のお古になってしまいますが\n どうか これを 受け取ってください:
Yes! I know this is going to be secondhand,
but please, take this!

13505.「魔法とは 善も悪もない ただのチカラ。\n それをどう使うかは 術者次第なので:
Magic is neither good nor evil, just power. It
is up to the magician how to use it.

13506.「私は ねこまどう界の天才術師として\n 魔法使いの証を 授けられましたが\n:
I was given the Proof of MGE as a genius in
the world of Meowgician, and you are the one
who deserves it.

13507.「たいしたものは 差しあげられませんが\n お礼に これでも もらってください。:
I can't give you much, but please take this as
a thank you.

13508.「ハハハ……。\n あなたほどの大魔法使いへの お礼には\n ふさわしくないかも:
Hahaha... perhaps not a fitting tribute to a
mage as great as you.

13509.「……ええ。\n 私にとっては <cs_pchero>さんが\n 理想の 魔法使:
...Yeah. To me, <cs_pchero> is the ideal
mage.

13510.「偶然とはいえ あなたと 友人……\n そう思って いいでしょう？……になれて\:
I'm happy to consider you a friend, even if
only by chance, right? I'm really happy that
we became friends.

13511.「一度は うれしさのあまり\n 直接 会おうとしたこともありましたっけ。\n す:
Once I was so happy that I even tried to meet
him in person. I immediately regretted it,
though.

13512.「なにしろ あなたは <cs_pchero_race>。私は 魔物。\n こうし:
After all, you are <cs_pchero_race>. I am a monster. I
was afraid that by exposing myself like this,
we might lose this relationship.

13514.「……<cs_pchero>さん。\n ひとつ聞かせてください。: ...<cs_pchero>. Let me ask you one thing.

13515.「私の正体を知った 今。\n これからも あなたは 私のことを\n 友人だと 思:
Now that you know who I am. Will you continue
to consider me a friend?<yesno><close>

13516.「もし ウソだとしても うれしいですよ。\n あなたと知り合えて 本当に よかっ:
Even if it's a lie, I'm happy. It's been a
real pleasure knowing you...

13517.「今の返事を聞いて 勇気づけられました。\n おかげで 決心がつきましたよ。:
I am encouraged to hear your reply now. Thanks
to you, I have made up my mind.

13518.「メギドロームのように 私の秘術をねらう者が\n また いつ 現れないとも限りま:
There is no guarantee that someone like Megidrome will come after my magic again anytime soon. That is why I am going on a
journey.

13519.「旅に出て もっと 自分をきたえて……\n あなたのような 理想の魔法使いを\n:
I intend to travel more, to strengthen myself
more, and to become the ideal mage like you.

13520.「それまでは シーバの鏡での連絡も\n 取らないことにしますよ。あれが あると\:
Until then, I won't even be in touch with
Sheba's mirror. I'm tempted to rely on that
one.

13521.「……では しばしの お別れです。\n どうか お元気で <cs_pchero>:
...So, I'm going to say goodbye for a while.
Please take care <cs_pchero>!

13522.「……そうですか。聞けてよかったです。\n おかげで 決心がつきましたよ。:
...I see. I'm glad to hear it. Thanks to you,
I have made up my mind.

13523.「メギドロームのように 私の秘術をねらう者が\n また いつ 現れないとも限りま:
There is no guarantee that someone like Megidrome will come after my magic again anytime soon. That is why I am going on a
journey.

13524.「旅に出て もっと 自分をきたえて……\n あなたのような 理想の魔法使いを\n:
I intend to travel more, to strengthen myself
more, and to become the ideal mage like you.

13525.「これからは シーバの鏡での連絡も\n 取らないことにしますよ。\n もう 甘え:
From now on, I won't even be in touch with you
via Sheba's mirror. I can't afford to be
lenient anymore.

13526.「……では これで お別れです。\n どうか お元気で <cs_pchero>さ:
...Well, this is goodbye. Please take care
<cs_pchero>!

13528.「……ああ 通じてよかった。\n <pc>さん 私です！\n リュナンです！:
...oh I'm glad it came through. <pc>
It's me! It's Lunan!

13529.「もしかして おどろかせてしまいましたか？\n 連絡は取らないと 言っていたのに:
Did I frighten you, by any chance? I'm sure
you must be wondering what's going on, after I
told you I wouldn't be in touch.

13530.「じつは 今後しばらくの落ち着き先が\n 決まったので そのことを\n お伝えし:
Actually, I have decided where I am going to
settle down for the time being, and I thought
I would let you know about it.

13531.「ウェナ諸島にある ジュレー島の南西には\n 猫島という ネコ系モンスターばかり:
Southwest of Jule Island in the Wena Islands
is Cat Island, an island inhabited entirely by
feline monsters.

13532.「ここなら 仲間も たくさんいるので\n また メギドロームのような奴が現れても:
I have a lot of companions here, so if someone
like Megidrome shows up again, I'm sure
they'll be able to help me out for now.

13533.「もちろん そういつまでも\n ひとに 守ってもらっているつもりは\n ありませ:
Of course, I don't intend to be protected by
others forever.

13534.「ここで 修行に打ち込んで いつか\n 自分の身は 自分で守れる\n 大魔法使い:
I intend to devote myself to my training here
and one day become a great mage who can take
care of himself.

13536.「それまでは この島に来てもらっても\n 私が 姿を現すことはないので\n ご理:
Until then, please understand that if you come
to this island, I will not be present.

13537.「では 今度こそ お別れです。\n 修業を終えて ムネを張って\n 再会できる日:
Well, this time we will say goodbye. I look
forward to seeing you again after completing
my training and putting on my mune.

28624.「バ バカな……ありえぬっ！\n 大いなるチカラを手に入れた 我が\n 敗れるな:
Ba, that's ridiculous... impossible! I, who
have received great power, cannot be
defeated... oh, abominable!

29698.「魔法使いリュナン……\n 我が弟子を 倒すとは さすが\n 秘術の継承者といっ:
Lunan the mage...to defeat my apprentice, you
are indeed the heir to the secret arts.

41556.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a guest room with a
mirror.
